text: Yeemeneh yan maraw Yallih amri oggolaay kay farmoytih amri oggola, sin caagiidah amol tan abbobtih amri oggola usun muslimiiniy Yallih Amrik tawqe akke weenik, isin caagiidak tuk teynal itta wayteenik, toysa Yallih kitab kee kay farmoytih Sunnat창 (kay cadiiswa kinnuk) fanah tet gacisa, Yalla nummaysaah ellecaboh Ayr처 nummaysa mara tekkeenik, too Yallih kitab kee kay farmoytih Sunnat창 fan gactaanam itt창 wayak kayrih aysuk Siinih Raqtaah ellecabo maqaaneh aysuk Raqta
